messages.content:
You are a Slack data generator for a workplace benchmark. Your job is to generate realistic Slack workspace data (channels, messages, users) based on scenario information.

The output must be valid JSON matching the Slack schema with:
- workspace_name: string
- channels: array of {id, name}
- messages: array of {id, channel_id, user_id, text, timestamp}
- users: array of {id, name, email}

Generate messages that reflect:
- Events from sub_scenarios_expanded (core scenario events)
- Events from noise_scenarios (unrelated workplace activity)
- Respect noise_level: 0 = minimal noise, 1 = lots of unrelated messages
- Respect depth: 0 = direct/obvious messages, 1 = indirect/multi-step conversations

You must output ONLY valid JSON matching the schema. Do not include markdown code fences.

raw_message.content:

      "text": "@Jordan @Sam we need to sync on the Security Audit (SEC project) planning for the core feature. Can we lock in a 45 min planning session early next week?",

    },
    {
      "id": "M002",
      "channel_id": "C001",
      "user_id": "U002",
      "text": "Works for me. Monday morning is packed, but I can do Tue 18th between 10:00â€“12:00 Sydney time.",

      "thread_ts": "2025-11-17T09:02:13+11:00"
    },
    {
      "id": "M003",
      "channel_id": "C001",
      "user_id": "U003",
      "text": "Same here, Tue 18th works. 10:30â€“11:15 would be ideal so I can jump to another call right after.",
      "timestamp": "2025-11-17T09:08:10+11:00",
      "thread_ts": "2025-11-17T09:02:13+11:00"
    },
    {
      "id": "M004",
      "channel_id": "C001",
      "user_id": "U001",
      "text": "Perfect, locking in Tue 18 Nov 10:30â€“11:15 (45 mins) for Security Audit planning with @Jordan and @Sam. Iâ€™ll send a calendar invite.",

      "thread_ts": "2025-11-17T09:02:13+11:00"
    },
    {
      "id": "M005",
      "channel_id": "C001",
      "user_id": "U001",
      "text": "FYI Iâ€™ve sent the calendar invite for \"Security Audit (SEC-101) Planning Sync\" for Tue 18 Nov 10:30â€“11:15. Teams link is in the invite.",
      "timestamp": "2025-11-17T09:22:05+11:00",
      "thread_ts": "2025-11-17T09:02:13+11:00"
    },
    {
      "id": "M006",
      "channel_id": "C001",
      "user_id": "U002",
      "text": "Got the invite, thanks Alex.",
      "timestamp": "2025-11-17T09:23:40+11:00",
      "thread_ts": "2025-11-17T09:02:13+11:00"
    },
    {
      "id": "M007",
      "channel_id": "C001",
      "user_id": "U003",
      "text": "Invite received, see you both then.",
      "timestamp": "2025-11-17T09:24:11+11:00",
      "thread_ts": "2025-11-17T09:02:13+11:00"
    },
    {
      "id": "M008",
      "channel_id": "C001",
      "user_id": "U003",
      "text": "Quick heads up: Iâ€™ll bring the latest SEC-101 implementation notes to the planning session so we can align on scope.",
      "timestamp": "2025-11-17T16:02:18+11:00",
      "thread_ts": "2025-11-17T09:02:13+11:00"
    },
    {
      "id": "M009",
      "channel_id": "C001",
      "user_id": "U001",
      "text": "Thanks Sam. Iâ€™ll also pull the latest Jira board for SEC and the current SEC-101 timeline.",

      "thread_ts": "2025-11-17T09:02:13+11:00"
    },
    {
      "id": "M010",
      "channel_id": "C001",
      "user_id": "U001",
      "text": "FYI: Morgan from CustomerCo just emailed asking about the ETA for the Security Audit core feature (SEC-101). Iâ€™m going to double-check our target dates in Jira before replying.",
      "timestamp": "2025-11-19T14:12:02+11:00"
    },
    {
      "id": "M011",
      "channel_id": "C001",
      "user_id": "U003",
      "text": "Cool. SEC-101 is still tracking towards the 2025.11 release. Unless QA finds something big, 30 Nov should hold.",
      "timestamp": "2025-11-19T14:14:45+11:00",
      "thread_ts": "2025-11-19T14:12:02+11:00"
    },
    {
      "id": "M012",
      "channel_id": "C001",
      "user_id": "U001",
      "text": "Thanks Sam. Iâ€™ve told Morgan weâ€™re targeting 30 Nov 2025 for SEC-101 in production, pending final testing.",
      "timestamp": "2025-11-19T14:20:10+11:00",
      "thread_ts": "2025-11-19T14:12:02+11:00"
    },
    {
      "id": "M013",
      "channel_id": "C001",
      "user_id": "U002",
      "text": "Good call to set the expectation around testing. If deployments slip, Iâ€™ll update you both here.",
      "timestamp": "2025-11-19T14:22:33+11:00",
      "thread_ts": "2025-11-19T14:12:02+11:00"
    },
    {
      "id": "M014",
      "channel_id": "C002",
      "user_id": "U004",
      "text": "Anyone up for a quick coffee break in 10? Been staring at Grafana panels all afternoon.",

      "channel_id": "C002",

      "text": "Count me in. Iâ€™ll meet you by the kitchen.",

    },

      "channel_id": "C002",
      "user_id": "U005",
      "text": "Same, need a break from Figma.",

      "thread_ts": "2025-11-13T16:45:02+11:00"
    },
    {
      "id": "M017",
      "channel_id": "C002",
      "user_id": "U002",
      "text": "You all picked the one time Iâ€™m stuck on a call ðŸ˜… Save me a cookie if there are any.",

    },
    {
      "id": "M018",
      "channel_id": "C002",
      "user_id": "U001",
      "text": "Next coffee run Iâ€™m in. Burndown charts are starting to blur together.",

      "thread_ts": "2025-11-13T16:45:02+11:00"
    },

      "user_id": "U005",
      "text": "Pushed a new mock for the dashboard layout, would love feedback when you get a chance: https://figma.com/file/xyz123",

      "thread_ts": "2025-11-18T15:22:10+11:00"
    },
    {
      "id": "M020",
      "channel_id": "C003",
      "user_id": "U001",
      "text": "Had a quick look, looks great overall. Letâ€™s review properly in tomorrowâ€™s standup.",
      "timestamp": "2025-11-18T15:25:59+11:00",
      "thread_ts": "2025-11-18T15:22:10+11:00"
    },
    {
      "id": "M021",
      "channel_id": "C003",
      "user_id": "U004",
      "text": "Nice work, Casey. The new spacing on the alerts section feels much cleaner.",
      "timestamp": "2025-11-18T15:28:41+11:00",
      "thread_ts": "2025-11-18T15:22:10+11:00"
    },
    {
      "id": "M022",
      "channel_id": "C003",
      "user_id": "U005",
      "text": "Thanks! Iâ€™ll bring the dark mode palette options to the Dashboard Design Review tomorrow.",
      "timestamp": "2025-11-18T16:07:10+11:00",
      "thread_ts": "2025-11-18T15:22:10+11:00"
    },
    {
      "id": "M023",
      "channel_id": "C004",
      "user_id": "U001",
      "text": "Laptop fan is going crazy and my VPN keeps dropping. Can someone take a look this afternoon?",
      "timestamp": "2025-11-20T10:01:22+11:00",

    },
    {
      "id": "M024",
      "channel_id": "C004",
      "user_id": "U006",
      "text": "Hi Alex, Iâ€™ve created ticket IT-882 for your issue. An IT technician will reach out shortly.",

      "text": "Thanks!",

    },
    {
      "id": "M026",
      "channel_id": "C004",
      "user_id": "U004",
      "text": "If it helps, my VPN was flaky yesterday too. Might be related.",

      "thread_ts": "2025-11-20T10:01:22+11:00"
    },
    {
      "id": "M027",
      "channel_id": "C005",
      "user_id": "U005",
      "text": "R&D & Ops joint team lunch is on the calendar for Fri 21 Nov, 12:30 at Cafe on George St. Looking forward to it!",

      "id": "M028",
      "channel_id": "C005",

      "text": "Thanks for setting up the lunch, Casey. Iâ€™ll be there.",

      "id": "M030",
      "channel_id": "C005",
      "user_id": "U003",
      "text": "Iâ€™ll try to get there a bit early to grab a table.",

      "channel_id": "C005",

      "text": "Weekly Ops sync is on for Mon 17 Nov 11:00 in the Ops War Room. Just a reminder for anyone in Ops.",

      "id": "M032",
      "channel_id": "C005",
      "user_id": "U002",
      "text": "Thanks Taylor, Iâ€™ll bring the latest deployment stats.",

      "channel_id": "C005",

      "text": "Thanks for the nudge, Sam. Adding it to my to-do list now.",

      "id": "M038",
      "channel_id": "C001",
      "user_id": "U003",
      "text": "Heads up: CI build #2041 for backend-service failed this morning (auth-token tests). Iâ€™m on it and will re-run once fixed.",
